plot.content:
Playing on the hybrid of digital and physical art. The robot applies a very mechanical curve motion on a very analog and organic process with a brush & eye-dropped ink on the canvas. Dimaine Amber ink on A4 Arches watercolor paper.

Plotted during a live stream on https://twitch.tv/greweb

data.title: Amber curves of hope
data.description: Playing on the hybrid of digital and physical art. The robot applies a very mechanical curve motion on a very analog and organic process with a brush & eye-dropped ink on the canvas. Dimaine Amber ink on A4 Arches watercolor paper.
